H0.text: what drug does the mom use in requiem for a dream. Heroin

H1.text: what drug does the mom use in requiem for a dream. Cocaine

H2.text: what drug does the mom use in requiem for a dream. Methadone

H3.text: what drug does the mom use in requiem for a dream. amphetamines

A4.text: Sara visits a physician who prescribes her amphetamines to control her appetite.

A5.text: Sara becomes frantic waiting for the invitation and increases her dosage, which causes her to develop amphetamine psychosis.
